nodes.text: Dornean Braha'ket Fleetworks Conglomerate was a starship manufacturer that notably produced the Braha'tok-class gunship, a gunship class designed by the Dornean species to used to protect their homeworld, Dornea, against the Galactic Empire. The gunships were designed as dedicated anti-starfighter platforms, armed with eight turbolasers and eight concussion missile launchers. A number of Braha'tok-class gunships also came to serve the Rebel Alliance during its war against the Empire.

The Dornean Braha'ket Fleetworks Conglomerate was first mentioned in the 2017 canon boxset and reference book Star Wars: The Rebel Files, written by Daniel Wallace. In Star Wars Legends continuity, it's sole mention was in the winning entry for the Braha'tok-class gunship in the StarWars.com Hyperspace contest What's The Story? by Ello137. Ello137 wrote in a blog on September 6 2006 that the contest allowed fans to give a backstory for certain aspects of the Star Wars universe.
